CRIAÇÃO DO BANCO DE DADOS:

CREATE DATABASE testeuseall
    WITH
    OWNER = postgres
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    LOCALE_PROVIDER = 'libc'
    CONNECTION LIMIT = -1
    IS_TEMPLATE = False;


CRIAÇÃO DA TABELA:

-- Table: public.cliente

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.cliente;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.cliente
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "Nome" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Cnpj" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "DataCadastro" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    "Endereco" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Telefone" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_cliente" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.cliente
    OWNER to postgres;
